name: mesa
description: Dynamic React Tables, and some component goodies thrown in.
author: Austin Billings <austinjb@upenn.edu>

scripts.compile:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir dist/es6 --source-maps inline
scripts.compile: npm run compile:es && npm run compile:sass
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/* && mkdir dist/css dist/es6 dist/commonjs
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.fast: npm run compile:es && npm run compile:sass
